metadata.name: Flying Away
metadata.description:
Sapphire was believed to protect those close to you from harm and also represented loyalty, trust, source of strength and eternal hope.

Picture a wave in the ocean, you can see it, measure it, its height, the way the sunlight refracts when it passes through, and it's there, and you can see it you know what it is. It's a wave.

Title: Flying Away
Artist: loftyruby

5556px x 5556px
Format PNG
